name: dsGrid (Direct, Simple Grid engine)
short_description: dsGrid is a direct, simple Grid engine that executes commands on one of a number of registered workers on distributed nodes. It's meant to be used on a cluster with a shared file system, and uses NetWorkSpaces to co-ordinate workers and submissions.
